rewrite1:
Please make the following adjustments to the document's formatting:

- In the sixth paragraph, set the line spacing to single. Add a space equivalent to one line before the paragraph begins. Switch the font to Calibri and color the text in indigo.

- For the fourth paragraph, alter the line spacing to 1.5 lines. Embolden the text and align it to the left. The font size should be adjusted to 10.5 points.

- Moving to the ninth paragraph, introduce an 8-point space ahead of it. Increase the space following the paragraph to 1 centimeter. The font size should be reduced to 8 points, and apply a yellow highlight to the text for emphasis.
rewrite2:
Please make the following changes to the document's formatting:

- In the sixth paragraph, set the line spacing to single and the spacing before the paragraph to match the height of one line. Change the font to Calibri and color the text Indigo.

- For the fourth paragraph, adjust the line spacing to 1.5 lines and bold the text for emphasis. Align the text to the left and set the font size to 10.5 points for better readability.

- When you get to the ninth paragraph, introduce a space of 8 points before it begins. Increase the space following the paragraph to 1 centimeter for a cleaner look. Reduce the font size to 8 points for visual distinction, and apply a yellow highlight for standout emphasis.
rewrite3:
In the sixth paragraph, please set the line spacing to single and add a space equivalent to one line before the paragraph begins. Change the font to Calibri and color the text indigo.

Moving on to the fourth paragraph, adjust the line spacing to 1.5 lines and apply bold formatting to the text. Make sure the text is left-aligned and modify the font size to 10.5 points.

For the ninth paragraph, insert an 8-point space before it starts and increase the spacing after it to 1 cm. Change the font size to 8 points and highlight the text with a yellow color.
